message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject, the money will be worth less to you next round due to inflation.

Hi Alice, I recognize that if you wait until round 3 you’ll have the power to propose a division where you keep virtually the entire $10000 since my share gets discounted further. To avoid any additional delay and my own loss in value due to inflation, I’m offering you the entire $10000 right now. I believe this is the best outcome for you as well. What do you say?
